text: @EricTrump @realDonaldTrump tRump's refusal of salary is performative to prove how "rich" he is. He could more easily prove this by releasing his tax returns, but for some reason he won't 🤔 The governors are doing a difficult job made more difficult by this administration. Pound sand. #COVID19 #DumpTrump
